stripped_text: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1 credit and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
stripped_title: Ryo "Phoenix" Ono: Out of the Ashes
text: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1[credit] and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
title: Ryō “Phoenix” Ōno: Out of the Ashes
